ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: This paper was presented at the first National Conference on Disaster Risk Science and Management in ‘South Africa’s response in a changing global environment’, 02–04 March 2015, at the Ranch Resort, Polokwane, South Africa. Jointly hosted by the University of Venda, School of Environmental Sciences, South Africa, and National Disaster Management Centre (representing Department of Cooperative Governance), South Africa. Faculty collaborators were Mr Tendayi Gondo, Prof. Agnes Musyoki and Mr Edmore Kori.
